leads.lead_text: Lemma less than 5 mm long; panicle erect
Lemma (excluding awn) more than 5 mm long; panicle usually inclined or nodding
Plant tufted; panicle oblong, often interrupted; Heyfield and Mallacoota areas
Plant rhizomatous; panicle dense, ovoid; a widespread species of cooler forests
